thread.title: Ghana FA chief Nyantakyi selected among powerful CAF members to meet FIFA chief Hayatou in Cairo
thread.title_full: Ghana FA chief Nyantakyi selected among powerful CAF members to meet FIFA chief Hayatou in Cairo

title: Ghana FA chief Nyantakyi selected among powerful CAF members to meet FIFA chief Hayatou in Cairo
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 19:40 CET Ghana FA chief Nyantakyi selected among powerful CAF members to meet FIFA chief Hayatou in Cairo - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
The President of the Confederation of African Football (CAF) and acting FIFA President Issa Hayatou will arrive in Egypt to take part in the CAF Executive Committee meeting, slated to be held in Cairo Wednesday to conduct consultations on the FIFA presidency elections. 
The Egyptian Minister of Youth and Sport Khaled Abdel Aziz along with other officials will be present during the meeting which will take place at the CAF headquarters in Cairo, Al Masry Al Youm reported. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
